about_the_game:
-Must own at least one episode from Batman: The Telltale Series to use this add-on.

Batman - The Telltale Series Shadows Mode brings a captivating new look to the storied Telltale Batman games. Enhanced with hand recolored gameplay and remastered textures, replay your favorite Telltale Batman episodes and experience the twisted world of the Dark Knight in a sinister, new way.
